title: A Rose for Lancaster
description: A York woman and a Lancaster man are forced into a marriage contract to please King Henry VII.Blanche Langley is swept into King Henry's ambitious maneuvers to secure the throne. Tensions flare as a plot to overthrow the king is discovered.As the York forces gather to make one last effort to win the throne, will Blanche betray her king and her husband, Giles Beaufort?
author: Christine Elaine Black
